Routine Descriptions

RBSP_EFW_PHASEF_READ_B1_TIME_RATE

 [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 Read b1 time and rate. Adopted from Aaron's burst1_times_rates_RBSPx.txt.
 Fixed sections with non-standard sample rates, i.e., those are not 0.5,1,2,4,8,16k S/s.
 Also, Sections spanning two days are handled properly now.

 datatype=. Can be 'vb1' or 'mscb1'.

(See general/missions/rbsp/efw/rbsp_phasef/spedas/rbsp_efw_phasef_read_b1_time_rate.pro)

RBSP_EFW_READ_L1

 [Previous Routine] [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 Read EFW L1 data.

 datatype can be 'esvy','vsvy',
 'eb1','vb1','mscb1','eb2','vb2','mscb2',
 'vb1-split','mscb1-split'.

(See general/missions/rbsp/efw/rbsp_phasef/spedas/rbsp_efw_read_l1.pro)

RBSP_EFW_READ_L1_BURST_BFIELD

 [Previous Routine] [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 Read EFW burst data. Save data in rbspx_efw_mscb1_<coord>.

 datatype can be 'mscb1','mscb2'.

 coord=. A lower case string sets the coordinate of the output data. 'mgse' by default.

(See general/missions/rbsp/efw/rbsp_phasef/spedas/rbsp_efw_read_l1_burst_bfield.pro)

RBSP_EFW_READ_L1_BURST_EFIELD

 [Previous Routine] [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 Read EFW burst data. Save data in rbspx_efw_eb1_<coord>.

 datatype can be 'vb1','vb2'.

 coord=. A lower case string sets the coordinate of the output data. 'mgse' by default.
 keep_spin_axis=. A boolean, set to keep the spin axis E field. 0 by default.
 keep_shadow_spike=. A boolean, set to keep shadow spike. 0 by default.

(See general/missions/rbsp/efw/rbsp_phasef/spedas/rbsp_efw_read_l1_burst_efield.pro)

RBSP_EFW_READ_L1_BURST_SPLIT

 [Previous Routine] [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 Read EFW burst split data.

 datatype can be 'vb1-split','mscb1-split'.

(See general/missions/rbsp/efw/rbsp_phasef/spedas/rbsp_efw_read_l1_burst_split.pro)

RBSP_EFW_READ_L2

 [Previous Routine] [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 Read EFW L2 data.

 datatype can be 'e-hires-uvw','e-spinfit-mgse','esvy_despun','fbk','spec','vsvy-hires'

(See general/missions/rbsp/efw/rbsp_phasef/spedas/rbsp_efw_read_l2.pro)

RBSP_EFW_READ_L3

 [Previous Routine] [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 Read EFW L3 data.

(See general/missions/rbsp/efw/rbsp_phasef/spedas/rbsp_efw_read_l3.pro)

RBSP_EFW_READ_XXX_DOWNLOAD_FILES

 [Previous Routine] [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 Download predicted files.

(See general/missions/rbsp/efw/rbsp_phasef/spedas/rbsp_efw_read_xxx_download_files.pro)

RBSP_EFW_REMOTE_ROOT

 [Previous Routine] [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 Return the remote root dir for loading the EFW data.

(See general/missions/rbsp/efw/rbsp_phasef/spedas/rbsp_efw_remote_root.pro)

RBSP_EFW_REMOTE_SUB_DIRS

 [Previous Routine] [List of Routines] 
 Construct and return remote paths.

(See general/missions/rbsp/efw/rbsp_phasef/spedas/rbsp_efw_remote_sub_dirs.pro)
